reviewText: Excellent portrayal of Peter the Great during the latter years of his rule by a first-rate Russian cast.
Enjoyed watching this movie with subtitled English

The portrayal of the tsar is memorable, drawing to mind the Russian cinematic classic of Ivan.  Baluev totally captures the manic-depressive drive of a power-obsessed egotist -- a character so common to Russian history. The supporting portrayal of his duplicitous tsarina is equally magnificent. It is an action drama worthy of repeated replays.
